data.title: SELECTED SATIRES OF LUCIAN by Lucian, Lionel Casson ed: VERY GOOD Hardcover (1962) First Edition Thus.
data.meta_description: First Edition Thus. - Hardcover - Aldine Publishing - 1962 - Condition: VERY GOOD - Very Good - xviii, 382 pp. Light blue boards, silver gilt spine lettering. Faint foxing, very light rubbing to tips, sharp and clean otherwise. DJ chipped and toned. First hardcover edition, preceded by Anchor Paperback edition. - SELECTED SATIRES OF LUCIAN

Terms of Sale:

All books are guaranteed as described. Any book may be returned for any reason within 30 days. Refunds will be processed once we receive the book in the condition in which it was delivered to you. Quality is our keystone. We are committed to offering fine books, shipped with care, in hopes of establishing a trusting relationship with our customers. We are committed to accurately describing every book we list. If the book you receive does not meet your expectations, please contact us.

Shipping Terms:

Standard shipping rate is $5 for the first item + $1 per additional item.

Priority Mail is $8 for standard-sized books, calculated rates for larger items and sets.

UPS and Fed-Ex are available on request at calculated rates.
